title: XP Pro SP3 Vol Edition with Apps (Unattended install)
description:
XP Pro SP3 Volume Edition Stripped + Extra Apps (Unattended)
Made & Upped By: sP00N
Additional Thanks goes to the makers of nLite. :)
Version 1.0
|-------------------------------------|

Warning! This install Disk only contains files for the English language and US Keyboard layouts! (Standard & Dvorak)

Note! This is an unattended instalation! The cd key is entered in for you!

|-------------------------------------|

Contents
I.General Usage
II.Tweaks Performed
III.Extra Apps
	1.Pre-Bundled with OS
	2.Standalone / Optional Apps

|-------------------------------------|

I.General Usage

You can Use this copy of XP anyway you like, just make sure to give credit when re-releasing.


|-------------------------------------|

II.Tweaks Performed

This is just a general list, nothing too specific:
-Removed Unneeded / Unsecure services.
-Shut off Windows Firewall.
-Removed Movie Maker, Net Meeting, and some other useless apps.
-Removed included drivers except for the ethernet since older 3com drivers are scarce on the net.
-Removed all other languages except for english.
-Removed international keyboard layouts except for standard US and Dvorak.
-Preformed various registry tweaks to increase performance and turn off annoying things.
-Unatended Instalation. No need to enter in a CD Key.

|-------------------------------------|

III.Extra Apps

1.Pre-Bundled with OS:
-.Net version 1 and 2
-ESET NOD32 FULL
-Foxit PDF Reader
-K-Lite Codec Pack 2.72 w/ Media Player Clasic
-Azureus 2.5.0.4
-CCleaner 2.08.588
-Firefox 2.0.0.14
-Miranda IM 0.7.7
-Real Player alternative Lite 1.80
-Quicktime Alternative 1.80
-WinRAR 3.71
-Media Monkey 2.5.5.998 (Keygen for gold version is in the Extras folder)

2.Standalone / Optional Apps:
-Alcohol 120% v1.9.5.3823
-Eset Nod32 (Incase If the patch does not work correctly)
-Webroot Spysweeper
-Burner.exe (Standalone burner app)
-Media Monkey Gold Keygen
-Programmers Notepead (Advanced Text Editor)
